sets.description: Increases max HP by **150k/180k/210k/240k** and volt ATK by **13%/15%/18%/20%**. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Increases the limit of the number of crystal thorns that Lost Melody (Rubilia's weapon) can create by **6**. After hitting a target with an electric weapon, all elemental damage to the enemy is increased by **25%/30%/35%/40%** for 30 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
